TopicTitle: Spotlight of Darth Vader Helmet - By Locob

Articles.Content:
Short little video to showcase the Darth Vader Helmet made by Locob. 

The song is "Imperial March" Played live by Richard Cheese.

Grab the mod on curse: [http://www.curse.com/ksp-mods/kerbal/230582-dark-vader-helmet](http://www.curse.com/ksp-mods/kerbal/230582-dark-vader-helmet)

+Rep just for the Richard Cheese. The world needs more Richard Cheese.

Thanks the maker !

you see, my profile pic uses it.  May the Force be with us !
